evidence.claim: Cosmolitan emphasizes their commitment to HIPAA compliance in their practices.
They utilize RESTful APIs to facilitate integration with third-party services.
The company mentions the use of AWS infrastructure for scaling resources.
No specific health-tech rails such as FHIR or HL7 were found in their documentation.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of usage or integration with X12 or clearinghouse services found.
